name: places/ChIJUTMhel1bwokR8nKUCI2A11E
formattedAddress: 49 Nassau St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 49 Nassau St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
I had to come back and update my review!

When I went, my lashes looked AMAZING! I ran to google to make my review. 48 hrs after install, nearly ALL of my lashes were FALLING OUT…I have had lashes for years and know how to take care of them…

When I attempted to contact the site, nobody ever picked up the phone, after dozens of attempts I gave up.
But two weeks later their phone worked well enough to ask me about scheduling a follow up appointment.

I am very disappointed with the service I received and the hassle I had to fix it.

[Included is a picture of the lashes I found on my pillow when I woke up.]

originalText.text:
UPDATE: they reached out to me to apologize for the initial experience and made sure I received a brand new set from a different lash technician, complimentary. This new set feels SO much better and looks just how I want it. Thank you SUMI downtown.

Initial review: if I could give this place 0 stars, I would. I had the worst lash experience of my life. I first paid for volume set and only received a natural set. The lash tech glued the lashes to my EYE LIDS, not my natural lashes. They were all clumped up together it hurt SO SO bad. When I tried calling back they wouldn’t answer their phone until I finally decided to call a million times back to back and they finally answered. When I went in to “fix” them the same lash tech that messed up my lashes “fixed them” but they hurt the same and they just looked worse. Then another lash tech tried to fix her job because it was still hurting and although she made the pain feel better she made my eyelashes look 10x more natural which I hate. The worst part is they did not offer me a discount or any compensation for their TERRIBLE work. I will never come back again.

originalText.text: It is very frustrating to make an appt and have to 15-20 minutes after your start time because the previous person comes late which runs over into your time. This is unacceptable and needs to be addressed . It’s extremely inconvenient and unprofessional. Be aware and understanding of peoples time. A rule needs to be created to support lateness because this is not okay. If the person is more than 10minutes late they should have to reschedule…….. A love my lash tech but the operational leadership needs to step up.  Customer service 101

originalText.text: I bought a groupon for this place…$49 for a full set. When I got there the gentleman informed me that the set I selected was a very natural look, and I was looking for something an ounce more dramatic, so I chose to upgrade and eat the cost. I am so, so, SO glad I did. My lashes came out even more perfect than I imagined, and he only charged me for the difference between the groupon and the package I selected. I paid $18!!!!!! I said “come again?” when he told me the total, I couldn’t believe it. The whole staff was so kind, the facility was beautiful and cleanly. Not to mention so calming I fell asleep during the session! I will be returning and referring all of my friends and family to come here!!!

originalText.text: I stopped by after work to find out pricing and schedule an appointment. When I scheduled it the lady said it would be 90$. When I came for my apt, a different lady starts telling me different prices and says how a “Hybrid set” is a single eyelash, when everyone knows that a hybrid set is two dimensional. After I stated this to the lady, she said “we can negotiate”. I immediately saw this place was highly unprofessional. If they would lie about something so obvious, I wouldn’t trust them with my eyelashes.
